Youchoose is an environment that allows you to experience a different recommendation system. What you need to see new content is a browser extension, available for Chrome and Firefox. Algorithms are opinionated too, especially when they try to boost ads revenues.

A quick tour

How to install and use the tool

YouChoose is built by a non-profit. We promote an internet made for users, not for corporations!

We want to make third-party recommendation systems interoperable on YouTube, cause algorithms are opinionated too, especially when they try to boost ads revenues.

We believe users should be in control of their informational diet, and have the agency to decide who to trust. They should also be able to participate to the content curation, and to share these contributions with their community.

FAQ

If you don't see an answer to your question, please send us an email, we will be happy to hear from you.

Yes, YouChoose is freeware, that means that is available for use at no monetary cost or for an optional fee.

No, our innovative system allows you to demonstrate that you are in control of the Youtube channel. All you have to do is to publish a key we provide you in your channel description. When the linking process succeed you can simply remove it.

Whoever has activated YouChoose in their browser can see your suggestions on your content.

With YouChoose, you can choose to share anonymised data of what YouTube's AI serves you.

Each data record is sent over an encrypted channel and signed with a unique, single-use token, generated with your private key.

Because only you have this private key, only you can claim these records, aggregate them, or delete them. No one else can relink your contributions, not even us.

Recommendation algorithms don't have your best interest in mind.
Platforms design their algorithms to maximize their financial interests: generate clicks and ad-revenue. This leads the algorithm to amplify the most attention-catching, sensationalist content.

You should be empowered to design your own information diet.

Our organization is a not-for-profit, so the objective of this tool is not to maximize revenues. It is a strong political move in line with our activist views to promote a decentralization of the web outside of the huge platforms.

This project has received funding from the European Unionâ€™s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme within the framework of the LEDGER Project funded under grant agreement No 825268.
